Name: ocf_me
definition: current Operating activities Cash Flow scaled by current market equity (i.e. Share Price times publicly held number of shares)

Name: oaccruals_at
definition: Current operating Accruals (i.e. Net Income minus Operating Activities Net Cash Flow) scaled by current total assets.

Name: oaccruals_ni
definition: ratio of Operating Accruals (i.e. Net Income minus Operating Activities Net Cash Flow) to the  current Net Income Including Extraordinary Items

Name: ocf_at_chg1
definition: Change in operating activities cash flow over a year

Name: ocfq_saleq_std
definition: Volatility of the ratio of current quarterly value of  Operating activities of the Cash Flow to current quarterly value of  Sales

Name: ocf_at
definition: current ratio of Operating activities Cash Flow scaled by current total assets
